questions.text: Question 1: Others tend to look up to me.
Question 2: Feeling accepted by others matters a great deal to me.
Question 3: I require a sense of inner stability.
Question 4: Taking chances doesn’t bother me.
Question 5: I welcome change without hesitation.
Question 6: As long as you persist, a setback isn’t truly a defeat.
Question 7: I value helping others in return for what I’ve received.
Question 8: I excel at looking after those around me.
Question 9: I often wonder what others think or say about me.
Question 10: I prefer as much consistency in my life as I can get.
Question 11: Making a positive impact on society means a lot to me.
Question 12: I enjoy creating fresh concepts and initiatives.
Question 13: I pay close attention to matters of safety.
Question 14: I strive to serve as a role model for people.
Question 15: I have a strong drive to win.
Question 16: I can’t tolerate feeling uninterested or idle.
Question 17: I’m skilled at building relationships with others.
Question 18: I’m always working toward becoming better.
Question 19: Excitement from danger never appeals to me.
Question 20: In my closest relationships, I’m typically the one who gives more.
Question 21: There’s endless knowledge waiting to be discovered.
Question 22: I must experience a sense of purpose and satisfaction.
Question 23: I regularly reflect on my own performance and worth.
Question 24: I prefer when life follows a foreseeable pattern.
Question 25: I show more affection than most people do.
Question 26: Being acknowledged by others means a lot to me.
Question 27: I enjoy the sensation of pushing myself physically or mentally.
Question 28: I’m cautious about not exceeding my budget.
Question 29: Ongoing learning holds great value for me.
Question 30: I naturally take charge in groups.
Question 31: I’m always seeking fresh adventures.
Question 32: At times, I stretch myself too thin helping others.
Question 33: My daily structures and routines matter deeply to me.
Question 34: I take great satisfaction in my personal identity.
Question 35: Discovering new things shifts how I view the world in ways I enjoy.
Question 36: Some of the most meaningful efforts aren’t compensated financially.
Question 37: I wouldn’t describe myself as someone who seeks thrills.
Question 38: No one would ever call me self-centered.
Question 39: I sometimes spend more than I can afford.
Question 40: Feeling significant to others is important to me.
Question 41: Every mistake offers a valuable lesson.
Question 42: I love acquiring knowledge so I can share it with others.
Question 43: Harmony and closeness are what I seek in relationships.
Question 44: I want my actions to create meaningful change.
Question 45: I hold back from decisions until I’m certain of the outcomes.
Question 46: Feeling stuck or restricted causes me real distress.
Question 47: I find pleasure in moments of uncertainty and tension.
Question 48: Having high status matters greatly to me.
Question 49: I have a deeply romantic nature.
Question 50: I’m continually expanding my knowledge and skills.
Question 51: Offering to others brings me more joy than receiving.
Question 52: I always aim to come out on top.
Question 53: I avoid any form of risk whenever possible.
Question 54: I enjoy ongoing personal development.
Question 55: I gladly devote my resources to worthwhile causes.
Question 56: I appreciate being looked up to by others.
Question 57: I take pride in how quickly I can master new subjects.
Question 58: Our purpose is to improve the world around us.
Question 59: I seek growth across various aspects of my life.
Question 60: Close personal connections are my highest priority.
Question 61: At times, others find me quite commanding.
Question 62: I regularly pursue new sources of enjoyment.
Question 63: I worry about anything that could involve danger.
Question 64: Finding meaning in your work outweighs external praise.
Question 65: I work hard to enhance my abilities.
Question 66: I build bonds by generously sharing my resources and effort.
Question 67: I prefer to think things through thoroughly before acting.
Question 68: Occasionally, I enjoy the rush that comes with fear.
Question 69: Feeling valued and honored by others is essential to me.
Question 70: Without continued development, life loses its vitality.
Question 71: A sense of connection with others is vital to me.
Question 72: Life gains meaning through leaving a lasting impact.
Question 73: Being at ease in every situation is a priority for me.
Question 74: I thrive when engaged in a wide variety of pursuits.
Question 75: I often measure my achievements against those of others.
Question 76: Deep emotional intensity is necessary in my relationships.
Question 77: Without helping others, my existence feels empty.
Question 78: When choosing, I often consider what will bring more pleasure.
Question 79: I can’t bear the sense of standing still in life.
Question 80: My safety and security are top concerns at all times.
Question 81: Once I commit, I sometimes fear missing a better option.
Question 82: I never want others to view me as unsuccessful.
Question 83: Having a steady life isn’t a big concern for me.
Question 84: I feel driven by a greater purpose.
Question 85: I feel a deep longing to be closer to God.
Question 86: Surrendering my will to God's plan brings me true peace.
Question 87: Wholehearted devotion to the Lord is essential for my fulfillment.
Question 88: I often sense inspiration or guidance from the Holy Spirit.
Question 89: My faith in Jesus Christ is the foundation that guides my life.
Question 90: Moments of worship or prayerful connection with God are vital to me.
Question 91: I need to dedicate my life fully to God's calling and purpose.
Question 92: Without devotion to Christ, my life would feel empty and meaningless.
Question 93: I am drawn to spiritual practices that deepen my relationship with God.
Question 94: I frequently receive spiritual insights or promptings from the Lord.
Question 95: True healing comes when I yield completely to God's authority.
Question 96: I crave a more intimate, personal relationship with Jesus.
Question 97: My soul thrives when I commit myself fully to following Christ.
Question 98: Devoting my life to God gives me the deepest sense of meaning and purpose.
